channel.title: baby picture on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in baby picture on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: My Best Picture
item.description: Aarush has crossed 6 weeks mark now and till recent time there was no picture of him with me. Well, there was no specific reason for the same. Normally, when I leave for work he is sleeping and in the evening it is dark and we are against using flash while taking pictures of Aarush. That leave only weekend but recent weekends were very hectic and I was away to Bangalore and the stories goes on…
